title: Best of The Herd for Oct 05, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Oct 05, 2020
description:
-Stop questioning Carson Wentz and Jimmy Garoppolo

-Mike McCarthy is insecure and it showed on Sunday

-Sunday's comeback for the Bucs was exactly why they wanted Tom Brady

-Russell Wilson makes everybody better

-Its Tua time in Miami

-Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong


Guest: Tony Gonzalez, Hall of Fame TE & NFL on FOX


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
